name: Lucid (itch) (Lucid)
description:
Los Angeles, 1940s. After blacking out from a night of drinking, Azad Yeraz wakes up in a mysterious bar he has never visisted before, Le Grand Rouge. The seemingly welcoming place soon turns into a maze inhabited by Azad's demons and regrets ; he has no choice but to face them before Le Grand Rouge manages to completely take hold of his soul and traps him there forever.

 

Features

  • Immersive 3D environments
  • 20-30 min per playthrough
  • Multiple endings
  • Voice acting
  • Original soundtrack
  • "Film Noir" mode

Credits

  • Jade Slim — Lead, 3D Environment, Level Design, Lighting
  • Yvann Yidika Mona — 3D Environment, Level Design, Lighting, Texturing
  • Arthur Vauzelle — Programming, Animation
  • Ilona Isoux — Concept Art, Character Modelling
  • Aurore Letourneur — Character Modelling, Animation
  • Yanis Bottet — Concept Art, Character Modelling
